charges.charge_description: 18:2113A.F On or about June 4, 2009 in Ector County, in the Western District of Texas, defendant did by force take property or money from the control of a bank or credit union in violation of Title 18, USC 2113(a).

charges.charge_offence_description: 18:2113A.F On or about June 4, 2009 in Ector Count

charges.charge_description: 18:2113D.F BANK ROBBERY, ASSAULT WITH A DEADLY WEAPON - defendant, aided and abetted by others, did by force United States currency from Western National Bank in violation of Title 18, USC 2113(a), 2113(d) and Title 18, USC 2.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 71 months imprisonment, to run concurrent to count 2. Defendant shall be on supervised realease for 5 years to run concurrent with count's 2 and 3. Defendant ordered to pay a special assessment fee of $100.00, and restitution in the amount of $30,154.63, joint and severaly.

charges.charge_description: 18:371.F CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES - defendant did conspire with others to defraud a federally insured financial institution in violation of Title 18, USC 371 and Title 18, USC 2113(a)(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 60 months imprisonment, to run concurrent to count 1. Defendant shall be on supervised realease for 3 years to run concurrent with count's 1 and 3. Defendant ordered to pay a special assessment fee of $100.00.

charges.charge_description: 18:924C.F VIOLENT CRIME/DRUGS/MACHINE GUN - defendant, aided and abetted by others, did discharge firearms during a crime of violence in violation of Title 18, USC 924(c) and Title 18, USC 2.(3)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 20 years imprisonment, to run consecutively to count 1 and 2. Defendant shall be on supervised realease for 5 years to run concurrent with count's 1 and 2. Defendant ordered to pay a special assessment fee of $100.00.
